STM: Feeling overwhelmed by college coursework, particularly in Computer Science and Calculus
Questioning life choices and future plans due to academic pressure

MTM.Summary: Navigating the academic rigor of college, particularly in STEM fields.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling overwhelmed, questioning future plans, academic pressure
MTM.Goals: Adapt to college demands, find career direction
MTM.Transition: Moving from high school to college environment.

LTM.Milestone: Began college, facing challenges in STEM courses.

short_term: Secure an internship in a STEM-related field
Maintain a GPA above 3.0
long_term: Graduate with a degree in a STEM discipline
Start a career in tech or research

STM: Struggling with social interactions and making new friends in college
Experiencing feelings of loneliness and missing high school friends

MTM.Summary: Struggling to adapt socially in college.
MTM.Patterns: Loneliness, difficulty making friends, missing high school
MTM.Goals: Build new connections, maintain old friendships
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from a known social environment to a new one.

LTM.Lessons: Importance of social support, personal growth

short_term: Join at least two clubs or social groups at college
Set up regular catch-ups with high school friends
long_term: Establish a strong network of friends and mentors
Develop long-lasting relationships both personal and professional

STM: Dealing with the stress of college life, including sleep deprivation
Concerns about personal hygiene and living conditions in the dorms

MTM.Summary: Dealing with the stress of college life.
MTM.Goals: Improve sleep, manage stress, maintain hygiene
MTM.Transition: Adapting to independent living in college.

short_term: Establish a consistent sleep schedule
Incorporate regular exercise into weekly routine
long_term: Maintain physical and mental health through balanced lifestyle
Develop stress management techniques for long-term resilience

STM: Surprised by the high cost of living in NYC, like expensive coffee
Feeling financially strained, particularly with the cost of education and living expenses

MTM.Summary: Facing the high cost of living in NYC.
MTM.Goals: Budget effectively, find ways to reduce costs
MTM.Transition: From parental financial support to self-management.

LTM.Milestone: Realized the cost of living in NYC.

short_term: Create and stick to a monthly budget
Explore part-time job or scholarship opportunities
long_term: Achieve financial independence
Save enough for graduate studies or a down payment on a home

STM: Pondering the authenticity of happiness and social interactions in college
Questioning the relevance of some classes to real life

MTM.Summary: Questioning the purpose and authenticity of college life.
MTM.Goals: Find personal meaning in education, reflect on life choices
MTM.Transition: From structured high school to open-ended college life.

LTM.Milestone: Began questioning the purpose of education.

short_term: Attend a seminar or lecture on philosophy or life purpose
Start a journal to reflect on personal growth
long_term: Develop a personal philosophy or life mission
Engage in continuous learning and self-improvement

STM: Struggling with coding assignments, particularly Java
Frustration with technology and its demands in coursework

MTM.Summary: Struggling with technology demands in coursework.
MTM.Goals: Improve coding skills, adapt to technology
MTM.Transition: From basic tech use to advanced applications in education.

LTM.Implications: Need for tech proficiency in academic success.

short_term: Complete an online coding course
Seek help from campus tech support or coding clubs
long_term: Become proficient in multiple programming languages
Contribute to or lead tech projects or startups

STM: Landed a summer internship in quant trading thanks to a family connection.
Started a group chat with new friends to discuss stocks and market trends.

MTM.Summary: Navigating college academics and exploring career paths.
MTM.Patterns: Questioning future plans, academic pressure, networking
MTM.Goals: Adapt to college demands, find career direction, leverage opportunities
MTM.Transition: Moving from high school to college and exploring internships.

LTM.Milestone: Began college, facing challenges in STEM courses.
LTM.Lessons: Time management, resilience, seeking help, networking

LTM.Milestone: Secured a summer internship in quant trading.

short_term: Secure a part-time job related to career interests
Expand professional network through LinkedIn
long_term: Gain a full-time position in finance or tech after graduation
Obtain a master's degree in a relevant field

STM: Had a positive first date with someone from class, planning for a second.
Felt like someone was watching, reminiscent of Rockwell's song.

MTM.Summary: Building new connections and navigating dating.
MTM.Patterns: Loneliness, difficulty making friends, dating exploration
MTM.Goals: Build new connections, maintain old friendships, pursue romantic interests
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from a known social environment to a new one, dating.

LTM.Lessons: Importance of social support, personal growth, dating strategies

short_term: Join at least one college club or group
Plan regular meet-ups with friends and family
long_term: Develop a stable romantic relationship
Build a supportive network of friends and colleagues

STM: Struggling with the heat in the city.
Celebrating a coding breakthrough with takeout.

MTM.Summary: Managing college stress and environmental challenges.
MTM.Goals: Improve sleep, manage stress, adapt to environment
MTM.Transition: Adapting to independent living in college, dealing with city heat.

LTM.Lessons: Self-care, stress management, seeking support, environmental adaptation

short_term: Implement a regular sleep schedule
Start a stress relief routine like meditation or yoga
long_term: Maintain a consistent fitness regimen
Explore mental health resources for long-term support

STM: Interested in exploring cryptocurrency and trading.
Heard about NFTs and their potential impact on digital art.

MTM.Patterns: Financial strain, surprise at expenses, interest in finance
MTM.Goals: Budget effectively, find ways to reduce costs, invest wisely
MTM.Transition: From parental financial support to self-management, exploring finance.

LTM.Milestone: Realized the cost of living in NYC.
LTM.Lessons: Budgeting, frugality, seeking financial aid, exploring investments

short_term: Create and adhere to a monthly budget
Open an investment account to start small investments
long_term: Save enough for emergency funds and future investments
Develop a comprehensive financial plan for post-college life

STM: Feeling grateful for meeting amazing people and seeing life fall into place.
Reflecting on how fast life changes and the potential of technology.

MTM.Summary: Reflecting on life changes and technological advancements.
MTM.Patterns: Pondering authenticity, questioning relevance, appreciating life
MTM.Goals: Find personal meaning in education, reflect on life choices, embrace technology
MTM.Transition: From structured high school to open-ended college life, technology growth.

LTM.Milestone: Began questioning the purpose of education.
LTM.Lessons: Critical thinking, self-reflection, seeking purpose, embracing technology

short_term: Attend at least one philosophy or self-improvement workshop
Engage in regular journaling or reflective writing
long_term: Define personal values and life purpose
Integrate technology and philosophy into daily life for personal growth

STM: Learning about blockchain technology through gaming and trading.
Noticed Ethereum but prefers Rust for coding projects.

MTM.Summary: Learning and adapting to technology demands.
MTM.Patterns: Frustration with coding, technology demands, exploring blockchain
MTM.Goals: Improve coding skills, adapt to technology, understand blockchain
MTM.Transition: From basic tech use to advanced applications in education, finance.

LTM.Implications: Need for tech proficiency in academic success.
LTM.Lessons: Perseverance, seeking resources, problem-solving, blockchain exploration

short_term: Complete a coding project or participate in a hackathon
Study blockchain basics through online courses
long_term: Develop proficiency in a programming language
Stay updated with emerging technologies for career advancement
